attributes.action: urge the Metropolitan Police to find a man calling himself John Sullivan, who on December 1st 2009 outside the Bloomsbury Central Baptist Church launched discriminatory and racist tirade against Jewish people in England. The Jewish community have suffered a long-running undercurrent of anti-semitism, and undoubtedly an example should be made of this man. The entire passage can be viewed here... http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6fUKsDG9v2A
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
John Sullivan told a Jewish graduate of Oxford University that... 

"Everybody in Britain can see what a nasty unpleasant type of people Jewish people are." (0.20 into the video)

"You should be part of Britain, Britain is a culture which Jewish people don't understand. You are not part of my country and I'm British." (1.49 into the video)

"Jewish people, if you look through the history are vindictive, probably evil, probably very unpleasant". (2.46 into the video)

"Most English people will tell you to f*** off back to Israel." (3.04 into the video)
